DOC.brief_title: Determine MTD , Evaluate Efficacy Safety Genexol®-PM Plus Carboplatin With Advanced Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I trial determine maximum tolerate dose recommended phase II dose combination therapy Genexol®-PM Carboplatin evaluate efficacy safety Genexol®-PM administer Carboplatin subject advance ovarian cancer debulking surgery .
DOC.criteria: Women ≥ 18 year old . Signed informed consent inclusion . Subjects histologically cytologically confirm advanced epithelial ovarian cancer . ( FIGO IIIBIV ) Subjects measurable disease RECIST debulking surgery . ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 . Estimated life expectancy 6 month Subjects clinically acceptable function blood , kidney liver screen visit Hb ≥ 10g/dl ANC ≥ 1.5×10^9/L Platelet Count ≥ 100×10^9/L Serum total bilirubin ≤ 1.5×ULN Serum AST ALT ≤ 2.5×ULN Serum ALP ≤ 2.5×ULN Serum creatinine ≤ 1.5×ULN Subjects receive chemotherapy ovarian cancer debulking surgery . Subjects history radiotherapy pelvis abdominal cavity Subjects receive immunotherapy hormonal therapy ovarian cancer Subjects malignancy within past 5 year Subjects major surgery debulking surgery within 2 week prior screening/baseline visit Subjects history metastasis currently metastasis central nervous system ( CNS ) Subjects preexist sensory motor neuropathy grade ≥ 1 base NCI CTCAE V3.0 Subjects serious medical condition Uncontrolled severe cardiovascular disease ( Ischemic heart disease , myocardial infarction within last 6 month , congestive heart failure ) Uncontrollable infection Previous allergic reaction connection paclitaxel carboplatin Subjects participate another clinical trial within last 4 week inclusion
